front.title: DRIP Entity Tag (DET) for Unmanned Aircraft System Remote ID (UAS RID)

abstract.t: This document describes the use of Hierarchical Host Identity Tags (HHITs) as self-asserting IPv6 addresses and thereby a trustable identifier for use as the Unmanned Aircraft System Remote Identification and tracking (UAS RID).
This document updates RFC7401 and RFC7343.

Within the context of RID, HHITs will be called DRIP Entity Tags (DETs). HHITs self-attest to the included explicit hierarchy that provides registry (via, e.g., DNS, EPP) discovery for 3rd-party identifier attestation.
